TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UsableDuringInitializationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UsableDuringInitializationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UsableDuringInitializationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示在 XAML 对象图创建期间是否自上而下生成此类型。

span.span: Indicates whether this type is built top-down during XAML object graph creation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自上而下的是一种工具以创建对象图时对与 XAML 处理器行为相近。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when creating the object graph. 如果生成的自上而下的一个类实例化时，附加到父级，，然后设置其属性。When built top-down, a class is instantiated, attached to the parent, and then has its properties set. 自上而下的构造避免了调用多次的属性更改处理程序。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 此类处理将波及对象图，并因此消除了多个处理程序调用提供的对象图的启动性能优化。Such handling will ripple up the object graph and therefore eliminating the multiple handler calls provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 中的 WPF XAML[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]，自上而下的构造已内置于 XAML 处理某些类。In WPF XAML for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], top-down construction was built in to the XAML processing for certain classes. 特性规范中的自上而下的行为的报告[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。The attribute formalizes the reporting of the top-down behavior in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool usable) cil managed

param.name: usable
param.span: 定义关联类在初始化期间是否可用。

span.span: Defines whether the associated class is usable during initialization.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性继承。This attribute inherits. 初始应用程序通常将作为`[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`，然后，可以设置，但`[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]`更改行为的派生的类报告的派生类上。For the initial application you would typically apply as `[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`, but you could then set `[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]` on a derived class to change the derived class reporting of the behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Usable As Boolean
public: property bool Usable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示关联类在初始化期间是否可用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated class is usable during initialization.

value.span: 如果关联类在初始化期间可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the associated class is usable during initialization; otherwise, .
